coreAttributes.authorTag: Nothing can indicate from where it is.
coreAttributes.name: Gene-seed
coreAttributes.description: A piece of bioengineering mass, needs to be implanted in order to work.

useDescriptions.selfUse: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(know)] someone that could implant something like that into [npc.Name]. After implanting it, on [npc.namePos] way back, [npc.Name] [npc.verb(change)] into a Primarch.
useDescriptions.otherUse: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(know)] someone that could implant something like that into [npc.herHim]. After implanting it into [npc2.Name], on [npc2.namePos] way back, [npc2.Name] [npc2.verb(change)] into a Primarch.
